name: Streamfire
tagline: Campfire rooms streamed to your terminal
body:
![streamfire icon](https://github.com/kelveden/streamfire/raw/master/img/sicon-55x55.png)
Simple [Campfire](http://campfirenow.com) client that streams the room to terminal.

Installation
------------
```
npm install -g streamfire
```

Then make sure you have a configuration file setup as `~/.streamfire/config.json`. Here is a minimal configuration:
```
{
    "domain": "YOURDOMAIN.campfirenow.com",
    "apiToken": "YOURTOKEN"
}
```

Running
-------
`streamfire`

This will give the full help and a list of rooms available to join under the domain specified in your configuration file.

Once you have joined a room hit F1 or F12 to see a list of available hotkeys.

And there's more...
--------
See the [README](https://github.com/kelveden/streamfire) to find out about features like:
 * Friendly room aliases
 * Notifications
 * Searching
